snippet.title: BLOODLETTER GameplayTrailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3493400/BLOODLETTER/

Bloodletter is a medieval deck builder all about customizing your unique deck to influence villagers’ stats to protect them from mysterious entities’ torment. In return utilise the villager’s unique deck-building abilities to enhance your healing methods, may your dubious methods work!
